pkgmetadata.longdescription: Arc-Darkest-COLORS is a flat, dark-mode theme with transparent elements, for GTK, xfwm4, openbox-3, GNOME-Shell, and Cinnamon desktop environments. Arc-Darkest-COLORS also has two varieties of matching Icons and Folders. You can choose between the 5 highlight colors Blue Agave, Kiwi, Plum, Strawberry and Tangerine.
